document_data.name: Xylene
document_data.mainbody: '''Xylene''' was a [[fomorian]] giant witch and a member of the coven led by [[Magra Curse-Eye]] who dwelled in the [[dark fey enclave]] within the [[Feywild]].{{Template:Cite game/Neverwinter: Fury of the Feywild}}
document_data.Abilities: Xylene was a particularly skilled [[alchemist]]. She was renowned in her coven for the variety of [[potion]]s she brewed, which were capable of emitting noxious fumes and vapors.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Xylene traveled to a [[quickling]] den in order to drive the fey creatures from their home and conscript them into the [[dark fey]] army of [[Malabog|King Malabog]].
